Adaptator: An Evolution Game

This game concept explores evolution by introducing random chance into the creation of animal body plans. The poster explains how to play the game. Each drawer has an animal’s body part in them. You roll the colored die, then open the drawer associated with the color that comes up. You add this to your animal and repeat until you have a whole creature. The game plays with the idea that evolution is the accumulation of random mutations.

← Back to Graphic Design
Game Design Project

Background

Resilience Continuum is a project by Claire Nyquist which explores science through data visualization, fiction, and graphic design.
